Dear Faculty members,

This letter is forwarding the LCI Event organized by the European Chamber of Commerce Taiwan. Those who are interested in participating can register in advance through the following website link. Thank you very much.

Following the first successful Female Leadership Talk on ESG in January 2023, the ECCT's Low Carbon Initiative (LCI) and National Taiwan University (NTU) will facilitate the second women's ESG leadership talk, with the theme â€œShattering the ceiling with Impactâ€ on 5 May from 14:00-16:30 at NTU.

Chaired by the NTUâ€™s Vice President, Prof. Chou Chia-pei (åœ‹ç«‹è‡ºç£å¤§å­¸å‰å‰¯æ ¡é•·å‘¨å®¶è““), five distinguished female leaders from different disciplines will share their inspirational leadership in sustainability that stimulates passion and innovation, encouraging people to collaborate and achieve greater ESG goals. It is hoped that the discussions will lead to collaboration to take on big challenges together.

The five female leaders are: Cynthia Chyn, Head of Public Policy, Taiwan, Amazon Web Services (å°ç£äºé¦¬éœç¶²è·¯æœå‹™å°ç£é¦–å¸­æ”¿ç­–å®˜ç§¦ç´ éœ); Eva Leihener-Stefan, Managing Director, Lâ€™OrÃ©al Taiwan (å°ç£èŠé›…ç¸½è£å¸«é€¸æ¨º); Boon Huey Ee, Managing Director Hong Kong and Macau & General Manager Healthcare Taiwan, Merck Group (é»˜å…‹é›†åœ˜é»˜å…‹é†«ç™‚ä¿å¥äº‹æ¥­é«”å°ç£ç¸½ç¶“ç†ä½™æ–‡æ…§); Christy Wang, Chairperson & General Manager, Ã˜rsted Taiwan (æ²ƒæ—­èƒ½æºå°ç£ç¸½ç¶“ç†æ±ªæ¬£æ½”) and Michaela Boye, Managing Director, Scania Taiwan Scania Taiwan (ç¸½ç¶“ç†æŸæ˜å¸Œ).

This event is free of charge, open to all ECCT members. Welcome to sign up the event HERE. (Link to NTU OIA registration page)
